name: Learn: Animals
description:
With Learn: Animals your kid will be able to learn the animal sounds, spelling, and pronunciation. 

Includes two modes:

1. Learn

  • Touch the animal to hear the how it sounds
  • Touch the word (spelling) to hear the pronunciation

2. Challenge

  • Different challenge type. (Can be configured in settings)
  • Your kid will have to select the correct answer out of three options.
  • Challenge types:
  • Match Spelling - Match the animal word spelling with the corresponding image.
  • Match Sound - Match the animal image with the corresponding sound.
  • Animals to match can be configured in settings

Different languages available. (Can be configured in settings)

Let us know about other learning activities you would like to add!!
